import "./viewProduct.css" import products from "../../constants/data" import BookmarkAddedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/BookmarkAdded'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export const ViewProduct = () => { const [item, setItem] = useState([]); const [resturents, setResturents] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getResturents = async () => { const resturent = await userRequest.get("/resturents"); setResturents(resturent.data); }; getResturents(); }, []) useEffect(() => { resturents.available.map((item) => ( `${item}`.push(resturents.products.filter((p) => p.type === item)) )) }, [resturents]) return (
